items.text: length on leg stump, clipped to square leg off the front foot
items.shortText: Bumrah to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: offcutter at a length outside off, stays deep in the crease and scythes this to third man
items.shortText: Bumrah to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.text: full toss wide outside off. Too easy. Deftly slices it past point
items.shortText: Bumrah to Liton Das, FOUR runs

items.text: full on off stump, toe-ended drive to extra cover on the up
items.shortText: Bumrah to Liton Das, no run

items.preText: sridhar: "I am reminded of 2007 Tamin .. charging out and hitting Liton"
items.text: short of a length offcutter in the corridor. Ramps it to third man after waiting for it to come on
items.shortText: Bumrah to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: length at middle stump, adjusts to defend back to the bowler after shaping to drive
items.shortText: Kumar to Liton Das, no run

items.text: full on leg stump, flicked to deep square leg
items.postText: Mahneel Musa: "So glad Liton is returning the favour, have defended him among the peers for so long. You go, LKDS"
items.shortText: Kumar to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: length on off stump, shuffles and just manages to get bat on this as he taps to midwicket
items.shortText: Kumar to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: length outside off, defended solidly on the front foot
items.shortText: Kumar to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: lbw appeal is turned down. Once again he's shuffled a long way. This time he's caught on the thigh guard as he looks to flick. India won't review. This looks much closer on replay. Both middle and leg were visible and it didn't seem as high as it first appeared
items.shortText: Kumar to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: length on middle stump, pushed to midwicket
items.shortText: Kumar to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.preText: Here's Kuldeep from the other end.
items.text: good length on off, and spinning into his pads. Goes onto the back foot, and nudges this to backward square leg
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: flighted full outside off, and he crunches this off the front foot. But the drive goes straight to Rohit at cover
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: overpitched outside off stump, and Mehidy takes a big stride forward to drive with the angled bat to cover point
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: hurries onto Mehidy! Length ball on off, but turning into him. Little footwork from him meant the ball cramped the batsman, but he manages to work this uncomfortably to the leg side
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: play and a miss. Tossed up outside off, and he drives inside the line of the ball. Dhoni collects
items.postText: Santhosh Nair: "Final is final,,, always pressure game. Could have gone for batting after winning toss. Hope this is not the repeat of 2003 WC final"
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: full on middle, and worked off the front foot with soft hands. Played towards midwicket
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.preText: farooq_gill: "Please tell me is this the pitch or Bangladesh doing really well?" -- Won't get a better surface in the UAE for batting. Here's Jadeja
items.text: welcomes him with a slap! Full just outside off, and he carves a square drive through the infield! Classy way to get to your maiden ODI fifty
items.postText: Mashrafe just punched his chest in delight.
items.shortText: Jadeja to Liton Das, FOUR runs

items.text: full just outside off, and pushed off the front foot to cover
items.shortText: Jadeja to Liton Das, no run

items.text: Liton's thrown it away, but wait, Chahal's dropped it! Full on off, and Liton tried to slog sweep. Top-edges it to midwicket, where Chahal was running back. But he fluffs the catch while falling over backwards. Hopefully he isn't hurt.
items.shortText: Jadeja to Liton Das, 2 runs

items.text: full just outside off, and driven off the front foot to cover with soft hands
items.shortText: Jadeja to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: wider outside off, and he taps this with the angled bat towards cover point
items.shortText: Jadeja to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: full and aimed at off stump. Comfortably caressed down the ground to long off
items.shortText: Jadeja to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.preText: Kuldeep pulls out on his delivery stride. Gotta reload.
items.text: full just outside off, and driven with the straight bat. Kuldeep scampers to his lfet and intercepts
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: half-tracker on off stump, and this one skids through. Mehidy swivels to pull this along the ground to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run
